content: **crocheted hat in drops alpaca bouclé and drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked in the round top down sizes xs - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ab-141 yarn group c + c or e ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs/s - s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head-size 53/54 - 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-100-100 g colour 0602 brown and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 25-25-50-50 g colour 05 beige **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 6 mm **crochet gauge** 12 double crochets in width and 12 row in height with 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
